definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
the right time for sth/the right season (for planting cabbage)

sentences.english: But those justifications have an incontestable value in their own day.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些辯解在當時卻具有必要的意義。

sentences.english: Pooling in the pelvic cavity. Which means her heart was stillpumping.
sentences.chinese: 骨盆腔有血液淤積，說明當時她的心臟還在跳動。

sentences.english: At that time, the public order in Dingxiang was very chaotic.
sentences.chinese: 當時定襄的社會治安十分混亂。

sentences.english: Visible at that time, contend for effect bookman , furniture of snap up fine wood also is one of vogue.
sentences.chinese: 可見當時，爭效文人，爭購細木傢俱也是時尚之一了。

sentences.english: His work partakes of the aesthetic fashions of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品具有當時的某些審美時尚。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 這首詩在當時十分流行。

sentences.english: My mother was wrapping some banana fritters for a customer.
sentences.chinese: 我母親當時正在爲一位顧客包香蕉煎餅。

sentences.english: Heavy wind at the time was another factor.
sentences.chinese: 當時的風颳得很大是引起這樣大火勢的另一個因素。

sentences.english: This image is stark in its brutality but was the reality of the time.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片雖然很殘忍，但是當時的真實寫照。

sentences.english: Even so, the peace activists of the day reacted to the news of his Nobel Prize with mortification.
sentences.chinese: 當時的和平活動家們也對他成爲諾獎得主感到恥辱。

sentences.english: At that time, England was in a Bible war between two English translations.
sentences.chinese: 當時，英國有兩版英譯《聖經》，互相不服氣。

sentences.english: Fourpence was a private soldier's daily pay at that time.
sentences.chinese: 當時二等兵每天的工資是四便士。

sentences.english: At the time Xinhui and I were neighbours, living in adjacent yards.
sentences.chinese: 當時我和新輝是鄰居，前後院住。

sentences.english: I then soldered up the top and bottom of the boiler.
sentences.chinese: 當時我焊接起來的頂部和底部鍋爐。

sentences.english: This was a mark of great shame and disgrace.
sentences.chinese: 這在當時是恥辱與不光彩的標誌。

definition: in those days/then/in those years/during that time
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
